title: Information and Digital Literacy Competency Enhancement Program for Visually Impaired Learners

context.prior_knowledge: Basic experience with digital devices and fundamental understanding of social information utilization
context.additional_context: Practice-Centered Training for Visually Impaired Individuals to Facilitate Independent Information Access and Adaptation to Digital Environments

learning_goals: Learners can independently navigate digital content with over 80% proficiency using screen readers and assistive technologies.
Learners can classify the credibility of online materials into three levels by applying information reliability evaluation criteria.
Learners can use public service digital platforms (e.g., e-government) with 90% accuracy in VR simulation environments.
difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
